**Integrated Correctional Program Model (ICPM) Services**
==============================================

**Solicitation Number:** 21301-25-4719783
**Reference Number:** cb-78-56939631

**Background**
------------

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is seeking a qualified contractor to provide professional services for the Integrated Correctional Program Model (ICPM). The contractor will specialize in group and individual intervention to provide intervention services to federal offenders in community with various needs.

**Objectives**
------------

* Provide effective intervention services to federal offenders in community with problematics in sexual delinquency, substance addiction, general or domestic violence, or structured criminal behavior.
* Deliver intervention services from the contractor's professional office.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The contractor will provide intervention services to federal offenders in community, including:

* Preparation of program delivery
* Program delivery
* Preparation of reports

**Estimated Quantity**
---------------------

Refer to the Solicitation Document for further information.

**Standing Offer Period and Time of Delivery**
-----------------------------------------

The work will be performed from July 1, 2024, to June 30, 2025, with the possibility of three (3) additional one-year optional periods.

**Security Requirements**
----------------------

The standing offer includes security requirements.

**Evaluation Criteria**
----------------------

The evaluation will be based on variations or combinations of the evaluation methods outlined in the Solicitation Document.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

* Eloïse Clément, Contracting Authority
* Phone: 514-234-6283
* Email: eloise.clement@csc-scc.gc.ca

**Instructions to Suppliers**
---------------------------

All interested suppliers may submit a bid. Suppliers can obtain the complete Solicitation Document and associated documents from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders. Suppliers may submit their bids in either official language of Canada (English or French).

**Procurement Strategy**
------------------------

The procurement strategy is Competitive - Traditional.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This procurement is not subject to any trade agreement.

**Regions of Delivery**
----------------------

This contract is subject to Quebec (except NCR).
